name: Bike to Tra Que vegetable village & Cooking class
description:
Tra Que is a
charming little village on the edge of Hoi An, the village is named after the
sweet scented vegetables that spice up the everyday meals of the Pho Hoi
people. Here a new spirit for traditional Hoi An dishes like Cao Lau, Quang
noodles, enjoy cooking class served by host with the local ‘Tam Huu’ spring
roll which were primarily made from Tra Que vegetables and cake with meat (Banh
xeo) has been enlivened.
